name: slink
description: Slink is a self-hosted link shortener and micro-landing-page generator. It supports custom domains, analytics, and a straightforward management UI.

features.title: Url Shortening
features.description: Creates short links with custom or auto-generated slugs

features.title: Landing Pages
features.description: Builds micro-landing pages with multiple links and content blocks

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Tracks visits, referrers, devices, and geographic locations

features.title: Custom Domains
features.description: Uses your own domains for branded short links

features.title: Qr Codes
features.description: Generates QR codes for each short link automatically

features.title: Link Expiration
features.description: Sets automatic expiration dates for temporary links

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secures links with passwords for restricted access

features.title: A/b Testing
features.description: Creates multiple destinations and rotates traffic for testing
